original: 潁川潁陰人，荀彧之子。好言道家之說，被後世認為是開玄學濫觴者之一。其人雖好美色，卻專情於妻子曹氏。曹氏患熱病死後，荀粲因悲傷過度而逝世。
text: Yingchuan Yingyin people, son of Xun Yu. The sayings of Taoism are thought to be one of the originators of metaphysics. Although he is beautiful, he is devoted to his wife Cao. After Cao died of fever, Xun Can passed away due to excessive grief.
